seriesJson.title: The truth about radio
seriesJson.description: A series that features interviews with important figures in the radio industry.

node.title: Edwin G. Burrows
node.description: Richard Doan interviews Edwin G. Burrows, chairman of National Association of Educational Broadcasters and manager of WUOM at the University of Michigan. He discusses his station and educational radio and television programming.

node.title: Nicholas Johnson
node.description: Richard Doan interviews Federal Communications Commission member Nicholas Johnson.
